title.en: Classroom of the Elite - 2nd Year Arc

altTitles.ja: ようこそ実力至上主義の教室へ 2年生編

altTitles.ru: Добро пожаловать в класс превосходства - Второй год

altTitles.vi: Chào mừng đến với lớp học đề cao thực lực năm 2

altTitles.ja-ro: Youkoso Jitsuryoku Shijou Shugi no Kyoushitsu e: 2-nensei-hen

description.en: The second spring at the Advanced Nurturing High School is welcoming Ayanokoji and Class D. The special exams aren't only what awaits them, but the unique freshmen as well. Kazuomi Hōsen and Ryūen. The two who shared the bad reputation between themselves during Ryuen's middle school days. Takuya Yagami, who proclaims to come from the same middle school as Kushida, is approaching her. And the capricious Ichika Amasawa who is pulling Ayanokoji left and right.
description.pt-br: A cortina sobe e o arco do segundo ano dessa série extremamente popular começa!Quando Kiyotaka Ayanokouji e seus colegas de classe começam seu segundo ano, mudanças são vistas em toda a Tokyo Metropolitan Advanced Nurturing High School. Com a graduação do terceiro ano e a entrada do primeiro ano na escola, as alianças estão bem encaminhadas. Além disso, agora que Miyabi Nagumo é o presidente do conselho estudantil, a promessa de transformar a escola em uma baseada meritocracia pode se tornar uma realidade. Enquanto isso, os conflitos entre as classes continuam a crescer à medida que o total de pontos da classe se aproxima. Com outro exame especial se aproximando, Ayanokouji permanecerá nas sombras, ou ele finalmente entrará nos holofotes e ajudará sua classe a subir para a ilustre Classe A?

title.en: Te no Hira ni Ai wo!

altTitles.ja: てのひらにアイを！

description.en: Katsutoshi Umiyama is a young teacher of 25 years who is designated as responsible for the men's club volleyball school. The women's club, however, is in the hands of the beautiful Maho Kawashima. When Umiyama accidentally gets too close to a club girl, Ai, the student does not seem to be upset, but …

altTitles.ja: 天より高く

description.en: When the Devil King announces his retirement, he calls forth his two sons, Yomi and Sora, to give them each a quest. Whichever of them finds a pure Yamato maiden within a year would inherit the throne of the Devil King, while the other would die. Thus begins Sora's sex-fuelled adventure to find a woman that can satisfy his father…

**"Please sell me. I will become the most expensive lady in Sant'nar"**

Tired of the troubles brought about by his political marriage, debauchee Cesare coincidentally enters into an unusual  contract Adel, a shoeshiner from the slums.

The deadline is three months.

Expecting this to be his liberation from the tedious strategic marriage, Cesare finds himself becoming increasingly concerned about Adel, who behaves unlike any woman he has ever known...

"In the first place, didn't you bring me here to get me engaged to Sir Ezra?"
"That's right."

Cesare replied obediently for a moment before bursting into a sharp laugh.

"But why do I feel so disgusted?"

altTitles.ja: シバタリアン

description.en: In the spring of my third year of middle school, I found Shibata buried beneath a sakura tree. We watched movies and became fast friends, even planned to make a movie together for the school festival...but no one at school seemed to know him. I will discover Shibata and the whole world will turn into Shibata. This is a story of, by, and for Shibata. Now showing in a theater near you.

Playing Dumb Sterella Brother vs Beautiful, Strong, Miserable White Dragon Brother. Top Omegan white dragon Shou Yue killed the mafia boss, Si Xian, but saved his only son -- Si Mojue, and raised him like a younger brother. Unbeknownst to him, Si Mojue was an Alpha Sterella, only playing the part of a nice brother in front of Shou Yue, doing his best to become the person closest to him to avenge his father's death... An avenger, a murderer, and when the secret is revealed, what will they do?

title.en: Moto Azadarake no Kanojo ga Shinpai de

altTitles.ja: 元 痣だらけの彼女が心配で

altTitles.en: I'm Worried About My Girlfriend, Who Used to be Covered in Bruises

altTitles.pl: Martwię Się o Moją Dziewczynę, Która Była Kiedyś Pokryta w Bliznach

altTitles.ru: Я беспокоюсь о своей девушке, которая раньше была вся в синяках

altTitles.tr: Eskiden Bandajlarla Kaplanmış Olan Kız Arkadaşım Hakkında Endileşeniyorum

altTitles.ro: Sunt Îngrijorat Pentru Iubita Mea, Care Obișnuia să Fie Acoperită de Vânătăi

description.en: Continuation of [Azadarake no Classmate ga Shinpai de](https://mangadex.org/title/17447693-cb65-493d-8e21-dafb22d8340f/azadarake-no-classmate-ga-shinpai-de).

altTitles.en: Because She Is a Little Girl, I Am Excited Sexually

altTitles.ja: hshsさせろ!!

altTitles.ru: Она малышка, что меня и возбуждает

altTitles.ja: はすはすさせろ!!

description.en: Intellectual and cool, Tsuji Motochika is popular with the girls in class - but really, he's a lolicon with a head full of perverted thoughts. When he meets Tanabe Yuna, he is convinced he has found his ideal loli, until he learns she is actually his senpai.

William (who calls himself Wiwi in his head) is not your typical English teacher. The reason? He tends to be even less mature than his students. He’s headstrong, a tad bit vindictive and a rascal. Come along and discover how this teacher survives being surrounded by students with strange questions, colleagues who are just as crazy as he is, management who keeps him under close surveillance, and shoddy equipment that is ready to break down at any moment. In this Webtoon you’ll get to stand on the other side of the desk and discover the secrets of the classroom!
description.fr: William (qui s'appelle « Wiwi » dans sa tête) est un professeur d'anglais un peu atypique, puisqu'il a la particularité d'être moins mature que ses élèves. Tête en l'air, fainéant, quelque peu roublard, et un tantinet revanchard : découvrez comment ce prof survit en milieu scolaire, entourés d'élèves aux questions étranges, de collègues tout aussi bizarres que lui, d'une hiérarchie qui le surveille de près, et de matériel prêt à tomber en panne à tout moment. Avec ces webtoons, vous passerez de l'autre côté du bureau et découvrirez les secrets de la salle des profs !

altTitles.ja: ツンデレの女の子は可愛い
ジャイアントキリング

description.en:
A truly great coach makes the game of soccer interesting! Tatsumi Takeshi is 35 and has spent the last few years coaching in England before being brought back to Japan to coach his old team. His favorite pastime? Causing giant upsets a.k.a. Giant Killing! 

---
Official Release:
- English release by [INKR](https://comics.inkr.com/title/778-giant-killing?utm_source=mgd), [Azuki](https://www.azuki.co/series/giant-killing)
- Indonesian release by Level Comics

---
- In 2010, this manga received the 34th Annual Kodansha Manga Award for General Manga.
description.pt-br: Giant Killing é um mangá que conta a história de um técnico de futebol, ex-jogador japonês, que luta para levar times amadores à vitória contra times campeões. Tatsumi Takeshi jogava profissionalmente no East Tokyo United, o ETU, e era louvado pelos torcedores por dar tudo de si e levar o time à vitória. Certo dia decide sair do Japão para treinar um time amador Europeu, e desde então é considerado “traidor” por alguns japoneses. Então, dois membros da equipe do ETU vão atrás do técnico para que ele treine o time onde um dia foi jogador, para tirar o time do fundo do poço.

altTitles.ja: 忍者パパ

description.en: Nobu, a 32 year old salary man, is spreading justice from the shadows as a ninja while maintaining his family and working at his company. What he doesn't know is that he is being followed by mysterious persons and his gifted family. Can he put everything in order?

title.en: Demon X Angel, Can't Get Along!

altTitles.zh: 恶魔X天使 不能友好相处

altTitles.en: Demon X Angel Can't Get Along!

altTitles.ar: ملاك و شيطان! لا يمكن ان نتعايش

altTitles.pt-br: Demônio X Anjo, Não Conseguem Se Dar Bem!

description.ar: الشياطين والملائكة نوعان من الأجناس المتقابلة مع مرور الزمن سئموا من القتال ضد بعضهم بعض ولكي يتعايشوا بسلام سويا قرروا البدء بخطة زواج! الخطة لها فترة مراقبة مدتها عام واحد. إذا كان الشيطان والملاك لا يزالان غير قادرين على العيش سويا وفهم بعضهم البعض بشكل جيد ، فسيتم إلغاء الزواج و نتيجة لذلك ، تم اختيار جيا تشينغ (الشيطان) و يو شانشان (الملاك) بواسطة اليانصيب كشريكين في الزواج ، وبدأت حياتهم سويا كزوجين يجب عليهم التعايش معا بشكل جيد.
description.en: Demons and angels are natural enemies that have grown tired of fighting each other. In order to coexist peacefully, they decided to arrange a marriage between the two races! If the pair can't get along within the one-year trial period, the marriage will be dissolved. This is how Jiacheng (Demon) and Yu Shanshan (Angel) became the chosen "lucky" pair for the marriage. Sharing the goal of divorce, the two began their lives of "happy" cohabitation!
description.pt-br: Demônios e anjos são duas raças opostas. À medida que os tempos mudam, eles estão cansados ​​de lutar. Para conviverem pacificamente, decidiram iniciar um plano de casamento! O plano tem um período de observação de um ano. Se os demônios e os anjos ainda não se derem bem, o casamento será cancelado. Como resultado, Jiacheng (demônio) e Yu Shanshan (anjo) foram “felizmente” selecionados por sorteio como parceiros de casamento, e começaram uma vida de coabitação “feliz” com o destino do divórcio.

title.en: The Great Villain Senior Brother and All of His Yandere Junior Sisters

altTitles.zh: 反派大师兄，师妹们全是病娇

altTitles.zh-ro: Fǎnpài Dà Shīxiōng, Shīmèimen Quán Shì Bìng Jiāo
Fanpai Da Shixiong, Shimeimen Quan Shi Bing Jiao

altTitles.en: The Big Villain Brother and the Junior Sisters Are All Sick and Delicate
The Great Villain Senior Brother and All of His Yandere Junior Sisters

description.en:
Lin Xiao became Villain senior Brother of the Qinglan Sect after Reincarnation!

As long as you follow the plot of the original book, and become a Evil villain, you can become a God and ascend to heaven!

Even if he is suffering he had no choice but to tease the fourth junior sister, steal the clothes of the third junior sister, pour some strong medicine into the second junior sister’s water, and conscientiously perform the villain’s duties.
And Finally made it to the day when the male protagonist became a teacher!

Lin Xiao was very excited and prepared to poison the male lead. According to the plot, he will be caught by several junior sisters and thrown by the male lead.

He did not expect......
- - -
Second Junior Sister: My Eldest Senior Brother is still so kind, how can this bit of poison be enough! Look at me!

Third Junior Sister: I'll kill Ye Chen, and kidnap my Senior Brother! He is mine alone!

Fourth Junior Sister: I'll kill everyone... Create a world where there is only my Senior Brother!

Beautiful Master: He's so cute, poisoning behind his back, he really deserves to be called my good disciple.

Lin Xiao: (⊙ˍ⊙) You all should read the script! It's me who should be killed!

A relaxed and joyful anti-routine fairy tale.

altTitles.ja: 魔法学校の落第ビッチくん

altTitles.vi: Bé Điếm Đội Sổ Trường Phép Thuật

description.en: "Then... have sex with me!" Haruse Shinobu is a regular honor student at HA Etoile Magic School. He comes first in every test, and even the student council president, who has tremendous power within the school, doesn't respect him at all. One day, when I rescued a cute boy who was being attacked at school, he was forcefully forced on me...!?

title.en: We are the Main Characters of the Demon World!

altTitles.ja: 魔界の主役は我々だ！

altTitles.ja-ro: Makai no Shuuyaku wa Wareware da!

description.en:
Shaoron Teufel is an ambitious demon who has enrolled in the demon school known as Babyls, aiming to become popular and join the Student Council. However, a number of trials await him as soon as he arrives! Being recruited by a shady division, summoning a familiar, participating in a flying test… Will Shaoron be able to stand out even more than the special student, Iruma-kun?   
  
A collaboration between *Mairimashita! Iruma-kun* and a popular Japanese YouTube channel, *We are the Main Characters of ◯◯!*  

- [We are the Main Characters of ◯◯! channel](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCIZzHNbzlIskx3TxGznRyYg)

altTitles.en: The Stain of the Trapped Beast

description.en: Once a prince of a fallen nation, but due to the defeat in war, he could only be reduced as a prisoner and become plaything for the powerful people of the victorious nation. Xing Mu, who endured the humiliation and disguised himself as an Omega, was on a mission of revenge and restoration of his homeland. However, his biggest obstacle was the helpless second prince of the enemy nation — a beautiful omega who was marked by him in an accident. Therefore, the love and hate between the two, accompanied by the dark surge of revenge, tightly entangled together...
description.pl: Kiedyś należał do rodziny królewskiej, lecz jego kraj poniósł solidną porażkę. Mógł tylko zostać jeńcem dla potężnych ludzi zwycięskiego kraju, aby mogli się zabawić jego kosztem. Xing Mu, mimo iż czuł upokorzenie, przebrał się za Omegę, by móc się zemścić i odbudować swój kraj. Jednakże... Najważniejszą przeszkodą, jaką musiał pokonać, był drugi książę wroga, Hill, którego przez przypadek oznaczył, czyniąc z niego jego Omegę. W tym momencie miłość i nienawiść między dwojgiem ludzi są ściśle splecione z nurtem zemsty....

title.en: Isekai Saikouhou no Guild Leader ~Guild Saijaku no Boku da Kedo, Guild Members Zen'in no ai ga Omokute Guild o Yameraremasen~

altTitles.ja: 異世界最高峰のギルドリーダー～ギルド最弱の僕だけど、ギルメン全員の愛が重くてギルドをやめられません～

altTitles.en: Another World's Highest Guild Leader: I'm the Weakest in the Guild, But I Can't Quit the Guild Because of the Heavy Love of All the Guild Members

description.en: I thought that if I reincarnated, I would be able to build a happy harem and be peerless in another world...! ! The guild that was created on a whim has become the pinnacle guild of strong men. Moreover, except for me, everyone is handsome and beautiful. I'm the weakest in the guild... can I quit the guild now? The opening of the dark fantasy of the lethargic hero and the guild members who adore him at the level of worship――

title.en: Kore ga Koi da to Oshiete Kureyo

altTitles.ja: これが恋だと教えてくれよ

description.en: "I want to see him cumming with pleasure...more." Igarashi Kakeru, an ordinary high school student, has a grudge against Otori Keigo, the student council president. Keigo is a self-proclaimed super elite with good looks and is popular with girls, but he is arrogant. One day, Kakeru and his friends go on a bad spree and decide to go and mess with Keigo by themselves. He had only interacted with Keigo once in middle school, and was overconfident that Keigo wouldn't remember him, an ordinary commoner. However, Keigo remembered Kakeru very well. Surprisingly, they were having fun talking about silly things, when Keigo asked Kakeru to "teach him some entertainment for the common people." Kakeru's mischievous side comes from the fact that Keigo is handsome but not popular with women, and he boasts that he will teach him how to love... but Keigo takes it seriously and even asks him to "practice" it!?

title.en: FPS de Shoshinsha Bokotte Real Fight ni Hattenshita Kekka w

altTitles.ja: FPSで初心者ボコってリアルファイトに発展した結果w

altTitles.ja-ro: FPS de Shoshinsha Bokotte Real Fight ni Hattenshita Kekka w

altTitles.en: After Beating a Noob in an FPS, He Wanted to Fight Me in Real Life LOL

altTitles.vi: Sau Khi Bị Tôi Bón Hành Trong Game, Có Đứa Hẹn Kèo Đánh Tôi!

altTitles.id: Hasil dari Mengalahkan seorang Pemula di FPS yang Berkembang Menjadi Pertarungan di RL haha

altTitles.ro: Luptând Cu Un Începător La Jocurile FPS

title.en: Gods of All People: I Sacrificed Hundreds of Millions of Living Beings To Become a God

altTitles.zh: 全民神祇：我献祭亿万生灵成神

altTitles.en: Spirit Sacrifice: The Path to Godhood
Everyone Is a King: I Sacrifice Countless Lives to Become a King

description.en:
Han Wu transmigrated to a world where everyone can become a god. He obtained the ability to sacrifice life.
At the beginning, he had a trash clan, so he sacrificed to change his fate against the heavens.
With no power, no status, and no money, he sacrificed his way to the top.
As long as he has enough followers, he can become infinitely stronger through sacrifice, becoming the main god, the god of gods!

title.en: Mobile Suit Gundam SEED Astray R

altTitles.ja: 機動戦士ガンダムSEED ASTRAY R

altTitles.ja-ro: Kidou Senshi Gundam SEED: Astray R

description.en: Junk dealer Lowe Guele travels the universe with the Gundam Astray Red Frame he finds in the destroyed colony of Heliopolis!

Who am I? Where am I? What am I doing? Wait, wait! Great Alliance Leader! Stop it already!! I really…… am not the Cult Leader! The entirety of the Jianghu thought that the Cult Leader of the Demonic Cult was a woman—who would've thought that the Cult Leader could even secretly start a harem?!

title.en: Salaryman Exorcist - Okumura Yukio no Aishuu

altTitles.ja-ro: Salaryman Exorcist: Okumura Yukio no Aishū

altTitles.en: Salaryman Exorcist: The Sorrows of Okumura Yukio

altTitles.ja-ro: Salaryman Futsumashi Okumura Yukio no Aishuu

altTitles.ja: サラリーマン祓魔師 奥村雪男の

description.en: A spin-off of Ao no Exorcist, following Okumura Yukio as the main protoganist.

altTitles.ja: ないしょのストーカーさん

description.en:
Kadoya is a resilient, hardworking, and gentle person, so he’s often pushed to do a lot of work.
He has this certain “secret”.
He is living strangely with someone he can't see.
When he comes home completely exhausted, there’s a hot bath and meal prepared for him.
And at night…
—— “He” comes to his side and holds him.
Kadoya feels so perfectly supported in everything, from housework to letting our sexual frustrations that it feels like he can’t live without “him” anymore...!

altTitles.en: Captain Tsubasa: Road to 2002 - Go for 2006

altTitles.ja: キャプテン翼　ROAD　TO　2002

description.en:
After the World Youth, Japanese players are looking for pro careers in Japan and around the world.  
  
In order to fulfill their dream of World Cup 2002 in Korea and Japan, they must get stronger playing in various club competitions, home and abroad.
An unofficial compilation of oneshots / 4-komas by Cacomistle (カコミスル) in their twitter profile.

description.pl: Od gotowania, przez sprzątanie, po wszystko pomiędzy, Ha-yeon jest idealną pomocą domową! Jest tylko jeden problem... Woojin, który zarabia na życie tłumacząc powieści erotyczne, ciągle widzi swoją gorącą pomoc domową w swoich fantazjach! Może to tylko brak doświadczenia Woojina w sypialni sprawia, że jest sfrustrowany seksualnie, ale musi zająć się tą sytuacją, zanim sprawy wymkną się spod kontroli. Stary przyjaciel Woojina, złośliwy Sol, wysyła mu coś, aby spróbować mu pomóc, ale kiedy Ha-yeon przyłapuje Woojina w najbardziej kompromitującej pozycji z prezentem, czy to szokujące odkrycie będzie zbyt dużym obciążeniem dla nich obojga, aby je udźwignąć?

altTitles.ja: ちょいあ!

description.en: 4-koma about an otaku girl and her friends.

altTitles.en: Plaything: The Toy of a Grand Duke

description.en: A robust and naive mercenary, Ilrick, accidentally killed the son of the leader of his unit, who was after Ilrick's body. After he believed that he had successfully concealed his crimes, Ilrick received the summon of an unexpected individual. With flowing silver hair, the individual was the most handsome man Ilrick had ever seen in his life- the Grand Duke of Miros. The duke graced a chillingly beautiful smile on his face as he spoke to Ilrick. "Isn't it only correct for you to be the one asking me to fuck you up?"

altTitles.vi: Sứa không thể bơi trong đêm

altTitles.en: Jellyfish Can't Swim in the Night

altTitles.ja: 夜のクラゲは泳げない

description.en: Four girls, an illustrator, a former idol, a VTuber, and a composer, form an anonymous artist group called "JELEE", each pursuing their artistic dreams while supporting one another.

Recently, Siwon has been lively. This is because he has fallen inlove with Soyoung, a therapist he had met after receiving physiotherapy. Siwon has appeared quite a few times in front of Soyoung, but Soyoung doesn't give out affection easily. Siwon, who is faced with constant rejection, always keeps a smile on his face. This makes Soyoung look at him with an unknown smile on his face.

title.en: Maou no Ore ga Dorei Elf wo Yome ni Shitanda ga, Dou Medereba ii?

altTitles.id: Aku, Seorang Raja Iblis, Mengambil Budak Elf Sebagai Istriku, Tapi Bagaimana Cara Aku Mencintainya?

altTitles.en: An Archdemon's Dilemma: How to Love Your Elf Bride

altTitles.pt: Eu, um Lorde Demônio, comprei uma elfa escrava como minha esposa, mas como eu amo ela?

altTitles.en: I, the Demon Lord, Took a Slave Elf as My Wife, but How Do I Love Her?

altTitles.fr: Je, un seigneur des démons, ai épousé un elfe esclavagisant, mais comment l'aime-je?

altTitles.ru: Я, Владыка демонов, взял эльфийку в жёны. И как прикажете её любить?
Я, Владыка демонов, взял эльфийку-рабыню в жёны. И как же мне её любить?

altTitles.zh: 我这魔王娶了一个奴隶精灵当老婆，该怎么疼爱才好？

altTitles.zh-hk: 身為魔王的我娶了奴隸精靈為妻、該如何表白我的愛？

altTitles.ja: 魔王の俺が奴隷エルフを嫁にしたんだが、どう愛でればいい？

altTitles.ko: 마왕인 내가 노예 엘프를 신부로 삼았는데 어떻게 사랑하면 되지?

description.en: Zagan is feared as an evil mage, he is awkward and has a sharp tongue, and once again had to put down thieves that encroached on his territory when he was researching that morning. In a dark auction, he finds a white slave elf, Nephie, who holds a peerless beauty. Falling in love with her at first sight, he uses his fortune to buy her, but as poor as he is socially, he doesn’t understand how to connect with her. Thus, the clumsy cohabitation of the mage that can’t convey his love, and the slave that pines for her master but doesn’t understand how to bring it up, begins.
description.fr:
Zagan est craint comme mage démoniaque, un jour au marché noir il rencontre une esclave elfe du nom de Nephie. De part sa beauté innocente, il tombe sous son charme et décide de l'acheter. Bien que fortuné d'argent, ses compétences sociales ne le sont pas et il a du mal à savoir comment créer une relation…  
  
C'est parti pour une cohabitation maladroite entre ce maître qui ne sait montrer son amour et cette esclave qui en pince pour lui sans savoir quoi faire.
description.pt: Zagan é temido como um mago do mal, ele é desajeitado e tem uma língua afiada, e mais uma vez teve que acabar com ladrões que invadiram seu território quando ele estava pesquisando naquela manhã. Em um leilão clandestino, ele encontra uma elfa branco, Nephie, que possui uma beleza incomparável e estava sendo vendida como uma escrava. Apaixonando-se por ela à primeira vista, ele usa sua fortuna para comprá-la, mas sendo horrível socialmente, ele não entende como se conectar com ela. Assim, a desajeitada coabitação do mago que não pode transmitir seu amor, e a escrava que anseia por seu mestre, mas não sabe como agira, começa.
description.pt-br: Zagan é temido como um mago do mal, ele é desajeitado e tem uma língua afiada, e mais uma vez teve que acabar com ladrões que invadiram seu território quando ele estava pesquisando naquela manhã. Em um leilão clandestino, ele encontra uma elfa branco, Nephie, que possui uma beleza incomparável e estava sendo vendida como uma escrava. Apaixonando-se por ela à primeira vista, ele usa sua fortuna para comprá-la, mas sendo horrível socialmente, ele não entende como se conectar com ela. Assim, a desajeitada coabitação do mago que não pode transmitir seu amor, e a escrava que anseia por seu mestre, mas não sabe como agira, começa.

description.en: Jake, a seemingly average office worker, unexpectedly finds himself thrust into a fantasy world teeming with dangers and opportunities. Rather than succumbing to fear, Jake thrives in this unfamiliar realm. As he navigates the expansive multiverse, his power grows and he transforms—evolving from a mundane office worker into a true apex hunter.

altTitles.en: The Young Lady Is a Royal Chef

altTitles.es: La princesa es un chef imperial

altTitles.ja: お嬢様はロイヤル・シェフ

description.en:
Sena’s been tossed into another world, as the despised daughter of a noble family. Her little restaurant was her refuge in her last life, so she’s got some tricks up her sleeve—cooking skills! 

As Senianna, she’ll put her brains and fine-tuned taste buds (Korean fried chicken, anyone?) to the test so she can take back the kitchen and gain this society’s esteemed title of Chef Royale. Will her cuisine reign supreme over the empire and bring her the sweet and salty balance of power and affection?

---

[Original Webtoon](https://page.kakao.com/home/55268483)

Official Translations:
* [English](https://tapas.io/series/lady-chef-royale/info)
* [Chinese (Simplified) / 汉语](https://www.podoteng.com/)
* [Indonesian / Bahasa Indonesia](https://kakaopage.co.id/content/Royal-Chef-Lady/3380)
* [Japanese / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/46395)
---
As a chef at a small knight's restaurant, I became the nuisance youngest daughter of a powerful man who was afraid of the emperor. I tried to run away with all my travel expenses…

It’s strange.

“If you say you're sorry, are you that shameless?”
“That’s because I’m your brother.”
“Why don't you take Grandmother on a stroll?”

Why is everyone so nice to me all of a sudden?

“Why do you want to take out someone's eyeballs when they see me?"

People who had caught me trying to escape. I'm just cooking. What's wrong with you?
description.id:
Aku yang dulu hidup dalam penderitaan sewaktu kecil, kini berhasil menjalankan restoran kecil di pinggir jalan dengan guruku yang menjadi orang tua sekaligus teman terbaikku.

Hingga suatu saat, guruku meninggal. Tapi, kemalanganku tidak berhenti di sana. Aku meninggal dan mendapati diriku di dunia lain. Aku kembali hidup sebagai cucu orang paling kuat di wilayah timur?!

Mendapati diriku sebagai Seniana, sekarang aku harus berjuang menjalani hidup dan menjadi royal chef paling hebat!

---

[Original Webtoon](https://page.kakao.com/home/55268483)

Official Translations:
* [English](https://tapas.io/series/lady-chef-royale/info)
* [Chinese (Simplified) / 汉语](https://www.podoteng.com/)
* [Indonesian / Bahasa Indonesia](https://kakaopage.co.id/content/Royal-Chef-Lady/3380)
* [Japanese / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/46395)
description.ko:
작은 기사 식당의 요리사였던 나는 황제도 두려워하는 권력가의 천덕꾸러기 막내딸이 되었다.
여비를 저축해 도망치려고 했는데…

이상하다.

"네게 미안하다고 하면 염치가 없는 건가."
"그야 내가 네 오빠니까."
"할애비와 산책해 주지 않는 거냐."

다들 갑자기 왜 잘해 주는 거지?

"너를 보는 놈들의 눈알을 죄 뽑아 버리고 싶은 건 왜일까요."

도망치려는 나와 붙잡는 사람들.
요리만 했을 뿐인데 왜 이러는 거람…

---

[Original Webtoon](https://page.kakao.com/home/55268483)

Official Translations:
* [English](https://tapas.io/series/lady-chef-royale/info)
* [Chinese (Simplified) / 汉语](https://www.podoteng.com/)
* [Indonesian / Bahasa Indonesia](https://kakaopage.co.id/content/Royal-Chef-Lady/3380)
* [Japanese / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/46395)

description.en: A hidden love story of a ghost princess who never loved anyone. General Jahyeon of Heeran Nation marries Soru, a ‘princess who sees ghosts’ by the king’s order. Jahyeon is cold to Soru, but he has the power to ward off ghosts, hence Soru wants to stay by his side. Soru is willing to sacrifice everything for Jahyeon, who is her only safe haven. Jahyeon is getting more and more concerned about Soru, but…
description.uk: Таємнича історія кохання принцеси-привида, яка ніколи нікого не любила. Генерал Джа Хьон з нації Хіран одружується із Со Ру, «принцесою, яка бачить привидів», за наказом короля. Джа Хьон холодно ставиться до Со Ру, але якимсь чином він відлякує привидів, тому вона хоче залишитися з ним. Со Ру готова пожертвувати всім заради Джа Хьона, який здатен дати їй відчуття безпеки. Він дедалі більше непокоїться за принцесу, але...

description.en: In a land where there is no magic, a land where the strong make the rules and weak have to obey, a land filled with alluring treasures and beauty, yet also filled with unforeseen danger. Xiao Yan, who has shown talents none had seen in decades, suddenly lost everything three years ago - his powers, his reputation, and his promise to his mother. What sorcery has caused him to lose all of his powers? And why has his fiancée suddenly shown up?

altTitles.ja: 双星の陰陽師

description.en:
Rokuro Enmado is from a family of exorcists who remove evil Kegare, but his real dream is to be a singer, a soccer player, or anything other than an exorcist. When another exorcist, a girl named Benio Adashino arrives, Rokura is suddenly inflamed with competitive spirit and decides to put his natural knack to good use. Their rivalry gets more complicated when they both learn they are the destined "Twin Star Exorcists," two ultimate fighters fated to marry and create the prophesied child who will eliminate all the Kegare in the world.


---
Official Release:
- Indonesian release by Elex Media as **Twin Star Exorcists** (2019)
description.ru: С давних времён доблестные оммёдзи сражаются со скверной - злобными духами, рождёнными из человеческих страхов, боли и отчаяния. Рокуро с детства мечтал стать сильнейшим оммёдзи и очистить мир от скверны, но ужасная трагедия на долгие годы убила в нём всякое желание бороться. Но кому есть дело до желаний гиперактивного мальчишки, когда от него и талантливой девочки зависит судьба всего мира?
description.pt-br: Rokuro sonha em se tornar tudo menos um exorcista! Então a misteriosa Benio aparece. Os dois são apelidados de "Exorcistas das Estrelas Gêmeas" e descobrem que estão destinados a se casar... Rokuro pode escapar de ambos os destinos? Quando o melhor amigo de Rokuro, Ryogo, desaparece, Rokuro é forçado a pedir ajuda a Benio para entrar em Magano, o reino dos Kegare, para resgatá-lo!

altTitles.ja: キャプテンキッド

description.en: In the 19th century, there lived a young pirate king, feared enough to be called the “Devil of the Sea”. His name is Captain Kid! With his mysterious guardian sword, Black Lightning, he sails the seven seas aboard his vessel, the Golden Drake!! What awaits him? Is it hell, or the furious waves of the ocean?! The adventurous tale of Kid and his band of rogues begins here!!

altTitles.ja: ぬるめた

description.en:
Kurumi, the dumb android.  
Chiaki, her guardian with a few screws loose.  
Sakina, calm, composed, and easily amused.  
Shiyuki, the only sane(?) girl.  
  
Follow their exciting high school life as they tinker with and pamper Kurumi, as well as talk about nothing in particular.

altTitles.ja: シリアルキラー異世界に降り立つ

altTitles.en: The Serial Killer Descends Into Another World
The serial killer is reincarnated into the another world.

altTitles.es-la: Un asesino serial ha descendido a otro mundo

altTitles.de: Serienkiller in einer anderen Welt reinkarniert

description.de:
Ein Mörder, der den Drang, Menschen zu töten, nicht stoppen kann, obwohl er damit aufhören will, erhält das von ihm gewünschte Todesurteil.
Seine Freude ist nur von kurzer Dauer, denn er wird in einer anderen Welt reinkarniert. Der Auftrag, den ihm die Göttin erteilt hat, besteht darin, 12 reinkarnierte Menschen mit seinen mörderischen Impulsen zu töten.
Nicht alle reinkarnierten Menschen sind Heilige!
description.en:
A murderer who cannot stop the urge to kill people, even though he wants to stop, receives the death sentence he wants.
His joy is short-lived, as he is reincarnated in another world. The mission entrusted to him by the goddess is to kill 12 reincarnated people using his murderous impulses.
Not all reincarnated people are saints!

altTitles.ja: トロピカル〜ジュ！プリキュア

description.en:
It's an exciting day for fashionable teenager Manatsu Natsumi, who is moving into the big city for the first time. Upon arriving, Manatsu is immediately charmed by the city's spectacles. However, things take an unbelievable turn when she encounters Laura—a real-life mermaid!

Laura is searching for the Precure, a group of radiant warriors who may have the key to rescuing Grand Ocean, Laura's home. This duty soon falls upon Manatsu, whose unwavering determination causes her to awaken as one of the Precure: the vivid Cure Summer. As new friends join the team, Manatsu needs to adapt to her hectic, new life while protecting humanity's liveliness from oceanic invaders! With each battle more difficult than the last, the girls must discover what is truly valuable to them.

altTitles.ja: カグラバチ

description.cs: Mladý Chihiro tráví dny tréninkem pod vedením svého slavného otce kováře. Doufá, že jednoho dne sám stane slavným kovářem mečů. Praštěný otec a vážný syn – mysleli si, že tyto dny budou trvat věčně. Najednou však dojde k tragédii. Temný den plný krve. Chihiro a jeho čepel nyní žijí jen pro pomstu. Epická bitevní akce s katanou!
description.en: Young Chihiro spends his days training under his famous swordsmith father. One day he hopes to become a great sword-maker himself. The goofy father and the serious son--they thought these days would last forever. But suddenly, tragedy strikes. A dark day soaked in blood. Chihiro and his blade now live only for revenge. Epic sword battle action!
description.ru: Юный Тихиро проводит дни, тренируясь под руководством своего знаменитого отца-мечника, который издавна изготавливает катаны для начала и конца войн. Однажды Тихиро надеется сам стать великим мастером мечей. Легкомысленный отец и серьезный сын — они думали, что эти спокойные дни будут длиться вечно. Но внезапно случается трагедия. Темный день, пропитанный кровью. Тихиро и его клинок теперь живут только ради мести...
description.tr: Genç Chihiro günlerini ünlü kılıç ustası babasının yanında eğitim alarak geçirmektedir. Bir gün kendisi de büyük bir kılıç ustası olmayı ummaktadır. Şapşal baba ve ciddi oğul, bugünlerin sonsuza dek süreceğini düşünmektedirler. Ama aniden bir trajedi yaşanır. Kana bulanmış karanlık bir gün. Chihiro ve kılıcı artık sadece intikam için yaşamaktadır. Destansı kılıç savaşı aksiyonu!

title.en: The Baby Prisoner of the Winter Castle

altTitles.en: Baby Prisoner of the Winter Castle

description.en:
On the night the kingdom fell and the entire royal family was being executed, Clarisse, who naturally thought she would also die, heard something unexpected. 

“We cannot execute anyone who has not reached the age of eighteen. Instead, I will kill you the day you turn eighteen.” 

And so, Clarisse is given ten years to live. 
Clarisse then heads North as a “prisoner.” 
And she asks the Grand Duke for only one thing… 

“Um, is it okay if I take this friend with me? It’s my only friend.” 

But what Clarisse holds out is a rock? 

It’s a new life in the North! 
But this life as a “prisoner” keeps on getting better…?
description.tr:
Krallığın düştüğü gece ve bütün kraliyet ailesinin idam edildiği sırada, doğal olarak öleceğini düşünen Clarisse, beklenmedik bir şey duydu.
“18 yaşına ulaşmamış olan kimseyi idam edemeyiz. Bunun yerine, 18 yaşına bastığın gün seni öldüreceğim.”
Ve böylece, Clarisse’e yaşaması için on yıl süre verilir.
Clarisse sonra bir “esir” olarak Kuzey’e doğru yol alır.
Ve Büyük Dük’ten sadece bir şey ister…
“Uhm, bu arkadaşımı yanımda götürebilir miyim? O benim tek dostum.”
Ancak Clarisse’nin uzattığı şey bir taş mı? Kuzey’de yeni bir hayat!
Ancak bu “esir” hayatı daha da iyiye gidiyor gibi mi?

description.en:
Lin Feng travelled through worlds and even obtained an overpowered system, but he still faces a pressure as huge as a mountain.

System’s main quest:
Lin Feng is to create a school; establish history’s number 1 sect and Lin Feng himself to become the number 1 founder.

To become history’s number 1 founder, Lin Feng started to work hard.

“Your name is Shi Tianhao? Natural born sovereign roots but it was stolen by your cousin? Now being raised in a little village your father placed you in? Come come come, follow your master and we’ll let those people know that justice that is owed must be returned!”

“Your name is Xiao Yan? A genius of the past but a loser now? Even your fiancé came over to humiliate you by asking for a divorce? Come come come, follow your master and we’ll let that brat know the meaning of: don’t bully a youngster just because he’s poor!”

“Your name is Zhu Yi? The son of a marquis but you’re being suppressed by your father? Your mother was a saint but she was assassinated? Come come come, follow your master and we’ll let your dad know the meaning how problems can be solved with your fists…no, with reasoning!”
description.zh: 简介穿越了，也有了一个系统，但林锋压力山大。系统主线任务：林锋开山立派，建立史上第一大宗门，林锋本人成为第一祖师。于是为了成为史上第一祖师爷，林锋开始奋斗。少年，跟为师一起开山立派吧！
description.pt-br: Lin Feng um viajante conseguiu um sistema que pode facilitar sua vida, mas ainda é muito difícil. Primeira missão do sistema, criar uma seita e conseguir discípulos e esta seita deve ser a melhor do mundo. Para ser o melho Lin Feng vai ter que trabalhar duro e ao mesmo tempo treinar seus novos discípulos.

title.en: Koushaku Reijou ni Tensei shiteshimatta node, Mental Otome na Ore wa, Zenryoku de Onnanoko wo Tanoshimimasu

altTitles.ja: 公爵令嬢に転生してしまったので、メンタル乙女な俺は、全力で女の子を楽しみます

altTitles.en: Since I Have Been Reincarnated as the Daughter of a Duke, I, the "Girl Inside," Will Enjoy Being a Girl as Much as I Can!

description.en:
A humble man in his twenties suddenly dies and is reborn as the daughter of a duke in an 18th-century lookalike world where magic exists!
He is now living a second life as the adorable "Miranda Mirandiehl," who looks like a doll.
As he was always a "girl inside" with girlish interests, he accepted his reincarnation surprisingly easily.
And so, after being reborn as Miranda, he will enjoy his new life to the fullest!
What kind of encounters await him, and what lies ahead in his gender-swapped otherworldly reincarnation life?

altTitles.ja: 聖母の断罪

altTitles.vi: Lời tuyên án của Đức Mẹ

description.ar: بعد وفاة ابنها بطريقة مروعة، تكتشف والدتهُ تنمر الآخرين الشديد عليه، فعقدت العزم على معاقبة أولئك المتنمرين الذين أخذوا ابنها الحبيب منها، وبدأت العمل كممرضة في المدرسة
description.en: The Nagare family was a happy home of three people. However, their son Kiritaka was secretly bullied at school. Then, an incident occurs, and the mother Mari's love for her son goes out of control.
description.ne: आमाबुवा र छोरासहित ३ जनाको नागारे परिवारको खुसीको घर थियो। तर, उनीहरुको छोरा किरिताकालाई विद्यालयमा गोप्य रुपमा कुटपिट गरिएको थियो।  त्यसपछि, एउटा घटना घट्छ, र आमा मारियाको छोराप्रतिको माया अनियन्त्रित हुन्छ।
description.vi:
Một gia đình ba người những tưởng đang hạnh phúc, cho đến khi Kiritaka, người con trai duy nhất của Nagare Mari "tự sát" vì "quá đau khổ". Cho rằng bản thân đã vô tình dồn ép con trai yêu quý, Mari toang tìm đến cái chết, nhưng không... cô vô tình phát hiện ra sự thật con trai mình đã liên tục bị bắt nạt suốt một thời gian dài bởi những con quỷ đội lốt người tại trường học.
Và rồi tình thương con da diết của Mari... đã vượt ngoài tầm kiểm soát của trái tim cô.
description.es-la: La familia Nagare era un hogar feliz formado por tres personas. Sin embargo, su hijo Kiritaka sufría acoso escolar extremo en secreto. Entonces, ocurre un incidente que haría que el amor de la madre, Mari, se descontrolara por completo.

altTitles.ja: 高音さんと嵐ちゃん

title.en: Rascal Does Not Dream of Siscon Idol

altTitles.ja: 青春ブタ野郎はシスコンアイドルの夢を見ない

altTitles.ru: Этот глупый свин не понимает мечту девочки идола

altTitles.ja-ro: Seishun Buta Yarou wa Siscon Idol no Yume wo Minai

title.en: The Survival Story of the Sword King in Another World

altTitles.en: Latna Saga: Survival of a Sword King

altTitles.ru: История выживания короля меча в фэнтезийном мире

altTitles.ja: 異世界剣王生存記

altTitles.th: การเอาชีวิตรอดของราชาดาบในต่างโลก

description.en:
After being recently discharged from military service and just drifting through life, Hanbin Ryu is suddenly transported to another world.

However, his “guide line,” the system bestowed upon him to help with his survival and growth, was filled with errors, causing him to be stuck in the tutorial stage for over 20 years.

When he is finally released from this personal hell, he finds everyone has turned against otherworlders like him. Just how will this low-level, super-tutorial newbie survive?

---

**Links:**
- [Webtoon Trailer](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=mLzbAKkDpYM)
- [Original Webtoon <Webtoon kakao>](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EC%9D%B4%EA%B3%84-%EA%B2%80%EC%99%95-%EC%83%9D%EC%A1%B4%EA%B8%B0/2363)
- [Official Traditional Chinese Translation](https://tw.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E7%95%B0%E7%95%8C%E5%8A%8D%E7%8E%8B%E7%94%9F%E5%AD%98%E8%A8%98/66)
- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://www.kuaikanmanhua.com/web/topic/6885/)
- [Official Japanese Translation](https://piccoma.com/web/product/34782)
- [Official Thai Translation](https://th.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E0%B8%81%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%A3%E0%B9%80%E0%B8%AD%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%8A%E0%B8%B5%E0%B8%A7%E0%B8%B4%E0%B8%95%E0%B8%A3%E0%B8%AD%E0%B8%94%E0%B8%82%E0%B8%AD%E0%B8%87%E0%B8%A3%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%8A%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%94%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%9A%E0%B9%83%E0%B8%99%E0%B8%95%E0%B9%88%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%87%E0%B9%82%E0%B8%A5%E0%B8%81/103)
description.fr: Transféré contre sa volonté dans un tutoriel où il doit lutter pour survivre, Ryu Hanbin y reste finalement coincé pendant 22 ans. Il est bloqué par un bug au niveau 4, et ce malgré la grande quantité d'XP qu'il accumule ! Quand il est finalement transféré dans le monde de Latna, le contraste entre sa puissance et son niveau lui pose bien des difficultés. Mais finalement, le véritable objectif n'est-il pas de vivre plutôt que de survivre ?
description.ja: ｢あなたは適合者として選ばれました｣ ｢あなたの能力でセルハラトナに生き残る確率は５％未満です｣ ｢自殺しますか？」 ニート生活から突如として異世界へ飛ばされた！そこはレベル5までを目指す初心者エリアだったが、「ガイドライン」のエラーでレベル5になっても再びレベル1になるという、地獄の日々を送ることになり？！ レベル5の裏に隠された、とてつもない能力とはー
description.ko:
『귀하는 적합자로 선택받았습니다』

『귀하의 재능으로 셀하 라트나에서 생존할 확률은 5% 미만입니다』

『자살하시겠습니까? Y/N』

“x-까.”

5% 미만의 생존 확률. 22년의 시간. 셀 수도 없는 마견과의 사투.
이 지옥에서, 나는 홀로 살아남았다.

5라는 레벨 뒤에 감춰진, 무지막지한 히든 스탯들과 함께!

대검 하나로 이계를 썰어버리는,
사상 최강의 레벨5 검사 류한빈의 극한 사이다 생존기!
description.ru: В момент, когда его переместили в другой мир, Рю Хан-Бин был обычным человеком, который недавно вернулся из армии. Хоть он и остался один в пустынном мире с кучей монстров, ему дали задание - стать сильнее. Но есть одна проблема - "система", которая должна была давать подсказки, полна недоработок.
description.th:
รยูฮันบิน ชายผู้เพิ่งปลดประจำการทหารมาได้เพียงสามเดือน จู่ๆ ก็ถูกพาไปยังโลกแปลกๆ ที่เขาไม่รู้จักมาก่อน ชื่อว่า 'เซลฮา แลตนา'
พร้อมมีข้อความขึ้นว่า ""คุณได้รับเลือกในฐานะผู้เข้าเกณฑ์อันทรงเกียรติ"" พร้อมกับไกด์ไลน์ที่บอกให้สู้กับมอนสเตอร์ และเพิ่มให้ถึงเลเวล 5 เพื่อไปยังพื้นที่ถัดไป แต่ด้วยระบบเกิดข้อผิดพลาด ทำให้เขาต้องติดอยู่ในนั้นนับสิบปี ที่นั่นมีเพียงเขาแค่คนเดียวกับสุนัขปีศาจ
อยู่มาวันหนึ่งเขาสามารถเพิ่มถึงเลเวล 5 ได้สำเร็จ และถูกส่งไปยังพื้นที่ต่อไปแบบไม่ทันตั้งตัว

การผจญภัยเพื่อหาทางเอาชีวิตรอดในต่างโลกของเขาได้เริ่มต้นขึ้นแล้ว
เขาจะหาทางออกไปจากโลกแห่งนี้ และมีชีวิตรอดไปได้หรือไม่
description.zh: 一个俗套的穿越后带挂升级故事，却因为外挂系统的运算错误而偏离方向。 渴望变强的他被困在新手村二十年，不断的战斗却始终无法提升等级。 九亿次拔剑，九亿次搏杀，他脚踩着尸山血海缓步走来。 “恭喜，您即将被传送出新手村…” 蛰伏的凶兽露出爪牙，万物都将屈服于他拔剑的光辉之下！
description.zh-hk:
「依照你的能力，
你在瑟哈拉特那活下來的機率低於5%。」

「你要自殺嗎? Yes or No?」

「三X啊。」

不到5%的生存機率、22年的時間、
與魔犬纏鬥了無數次，
我一個人...在這座地獄中生存了下來。

在5等的背後，潛藏著無比強大的隱藏數值!

帶著一把巨劍殺爆異界，堪稱史上最強的5等劍士，
柳寒頻生存記，看了保證超過癮!
